title: Is it mandatory to call athaan when praying alone? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Abdullah from Bangladesh abdah the aan of all prayers uh except M are called long after the W has entered in Bangladesh uh but sometimes if I have to pray at home due to some legitimate reasons uh is it mandatory to call the aan if the aan is has not been called yet in mid no it's not mandatory to call for the aan you can just make a and pray inallah
